genresAdvancedInfo.name: banda peruana
genresAdvancedInfo.description: This music genre originated in Peru and is similar to Banda Jalisciense in that it features brass instruments and percussion. However, Banda Peruana also incorporates elements of Andean folk music, such as the use of panpipes and other traditional instruments. The music is often played at celebrations and festivals, and is known for its lively rhythms and upbeat melodies.
